subject: Team Building Day: RSVP, Agenda, and Logistics
body:
Hello team,

We’re planning a half-day team building session on Thursday, October 24, 2025, 1:00–5:00 PM at the downtown community center. Please complete the RSVP by Friday, September 12 so we can finalize headcount.

What to expect:
- Short kickoff, two collaborative workshops, and a light social hour
- Casual dress; light snacks and nonalcoholic beverages provided
- Optional volunteering activity (no special skills needed)

Action items:
- RSVP (include dietary preferences and accessibility needs)
- Volunteer to facilitate a breakout (optional)
- Suggest icebreakers or activities you enjoy

Logistics:
- Venue is transit-accessible; parking validation available
- Remote-friendly option via Zoom for those not onsite
- Code of conduct applies; be respectful and inclusive

Questions? Reply-all or message me directly.

Thanks!
